leanGUIDO Compound List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ARGV
lgChordA chord based on lgNote, containing a list of lgVoice
lgDurationGeneric fraction class. lgDuration is used to store the information pertaining to the duration/attacktime of a note
lgEmptyEmpty note based on lgNote see GUIDO spec for description
lgEventA lgObject with duration and time-position
lgFactoryA factory class for lgSequence, lgVoice, lgNote, lgEvent, lgChord, lgEmpty, lgRest, lgTag
lgFloatTagArgDouble tag argument
lgIntTagArgInteger tag argument
lgNoteA lgEvent with additional pitch info
lgObjectA GUIDO object with no additional specific info
lgRestA GUIDO rest based on lgEmpty with Duration
lgSegmentGUIDO Segment based on lgChord with parsing support
lgSequenceA lgVoice used as GUIDO Sequence
lgStrTagArgString tag argument
lgTagGUIDO tag with name and a list of arguments given as lgTagArg
lgTagArgGeneric tag argument without value
lgVoiceA GUIDO voice with list(s) for events and tags
stringVisitorPrototype for a string visitor, not really used at the moment
strlist
tagStack
Please visit http://www.noteserver.org and http://www.salieri.org/GUIDO for more information an latest news about GUIDO Notation. Or contact us via email.
